name: Oat Cakes with Hemp
author: Dar
summary: Phenomenal hemp oat cakes, you can change them up by dipping half in melted chocolate, making them thinner and putting a thin layer of peanut butter in between, or just leaving as are - delicious!
ingredients: ½ cup hemp seeds (such as Hemp Hearts®)
1 tablespoon all-purpose flour, or as needed
1 tablespoon rolled oats, or as needed
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grind 2 1/2 cups oats and hemp together in a food processor
Add 3 cups flour, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon, baking soda, and allspice
Rub in butter and coconut oil by hand until mixture forms crumbs the size of frozen peas
Add water to the bowl with the oat mixture
Knead until dough is uniform and moist, adding a small amount of additional water if necessary
Turn dough out onto a surface dusted with 1 tablespoon flour and 1 tablespoon oats
Cut cakes into desired shapes and place on a baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until cakes are dry and firm, 16 to 20 minutes
